content: The instructions on how to change the user mobile number will be sent to the user email address.

comment.text: "This translation key is used for the 'Erase Mobile Phone Number' instruction in a user's mobile phone change dialog. It will be displayed to the user as they receive instructions on how to change their mobile number."

usage.context:
return (
 <ModalDialog isLoading={!tReady} visible={visible} onClose={onClose}>
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("MobilePhoneChangeTitle")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <Text>{t("MobilePhoneEraseDescription")}</Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 key="ChangePhoneSendBtn"
 label={t("Common:SendButton")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation is a bit verbose and doesn't flow as naturally as the English. 'التعليمات الخاصة بكيفية تغيير' is unnecessarily wordy. A more concise translation would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم إرسال تعليمات تغيير رقم الهاتف المحمول للمستخدم إلى عنوان بريده الإلكتروني.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrase 'عنوان البريد الإلكتروني للمستخدم' is repetitive.  'بريده الإلكتروني' is sufficient and more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'بريده الإلكتروني' instead of 'عنوان البريد الإلكتروني للمستخدم'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "The instructions on how to change the user mobile number" is not accurately translated. "Telefonu silinəcək" translates to 'the phone will be erased', which isn't the intended meaning. The sentence refers to sending instructions, not erasing the phone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçinin mobil telefon nömrəsini dəyişmək üçün təlimatlar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. "Telefon nömrəsinin dəyişdirilməsi instruksiyası" can be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mobil telefon nömrəsini dəyişmək üçün təlimatlar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'elektron poçt ünvanına' translates to 'to the email address,' the English implies a general email address rather than 'to the user's email address'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İstifadəçinin elektron poçt ünvanına

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Инструкциите за това как да смените потребителски мобилен телефон" is not the most natural way to say 'change the user mobile number'.  'Смените номера на мобилния си телефон' or 'Смените мобилния си номер' would be more idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Инструкциите за това как да смените мобилния си номер ще бъдат изпратени на потребителския имейл адрес.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of 'потребителски имейл адрес' is slightly redundant. 'Имейл адрес' is sufficient.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Инструкциите за това как да смените мобилния си номер ще бъдат изпратени на имейл адрес.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'mobilního telefonu' (mobile phone) is awkward in this context. It's more natural to say something like 'mobilní číslo' (mobile number) or 'telefonní číslo' (phone number).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokyny ke změně mobilního čísla uživatele budou zaslány na e-mailovou adresu uživatele.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrasing 'e-mailovou adresu uživatele' is slightly redundant. It’s implied that the email address belongs to the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokyny ke změně mobilního čísla uživatele budou zaslány na e-mail uživatele.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ユーザーの携帯電話番号を変更する方法は、ユーザーのEメールアドレスに送られます' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Japanese. It doesn't convey the natural flow of instructions being sent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 変更した携帯電話番号の操作手順をユーザーのEメールアドレスに送信します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically grammatically correct, the sentence 'ユーザーの携帯電話番号を変更する方法は、ユーザーのEメールアドレスに送られます' sounds very formal and stiff. The passive voice is less common in this type of instruction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 変更した携帯電話番号の操作手順をユーザーのEメールアドレスに送信します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'user mobile number' is translated as '사용자 모바일 전화 번호'. While technically correct, '모바일' can feel a bit awkward in this context. A more natural translation would be '휴대폰 번호' (mobile phone number) or simply '전화 번호' (phone number).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자 휴대폰 번호 변경 방법이 사용자의 이메일 주소로 전송됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ມືຖື' (mobile) is technically correct but might be slightly less common or formal than other options in this context. While not strictly wrong, 'ໂທລະສັບ' might flow better and be more commonly understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ໂທລະສັບ' instead of 'ມືຖື'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation "O telefone do utilizador será apagado..." (The user's phone will be erased...) is not a direct and accurate translation of "The instructions on how to change the user mobile number..." It introduces an action (erasing the phone) that isn't mentioned in the English source. It misrepresents the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: As instruções para alterar o número de telemóvel do utilizador serão enviadas para o endereço de e-mail do utilizador.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "endereço de e-mail" is understandable, using just "e-mail" is more common and natural in Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: endereço de e-mail -> e-mail

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'user email address' is translated as 'вашу почту'. While technically correct, it lacks the specificity of 'user's email address'. A more accurate translation would be 'на адрес вашей электронной почты' or 'на ваш email'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: на адрес вашей электронной почты

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයාගේ වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනයට' is a literal translation of 'user email address' but sounds unnatural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would be 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයාගේ තැපැල් ලිපිනය වෙතට'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ජංගම දුරකථන අංකය වෙනස් කරන ආකාරය පිළිබඳ උපදෙස් පරිශ්‍රීලකයාගේ තැපැල් ලිපිනය වෙතට යවනු ලැබේ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, using 'වෙතට' instead of 'යට' in this context flows better and adheres to common Sri Lankan Sinhala usage when referring to sending something 'to' a location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'යට' with 'වෙතට'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Инструкције како променити број мобилног телефона корисника ће бити послате на емаил адресу корисника' is slightly verbose and less natural than a more direct translation. A better phrasing would reflect the brevity often preferred in UI text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Инструкције за промену мобилног броја биће послате на е-маил адресу корисника.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses 'емаил' instead of the more common 'е-маил'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'емаил' with 'е-маил'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Instrukcije kako promeniti broj mobilnog telefona korisnika će biti poslate na email adresu korisnika." is overly literal and somewhat awkward. A more natural phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Instrukcije za promenu broja mobilnog telefona biće poslate na korisnikov e-mail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'korisnika' (user) is redundant and makes the sentence clunky.  It's better to use possessive constructions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Instrukcije za promenu broja mobilnog telefona biće poslate na korisnikov e-mail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'e-mail' is increasingly used over 'email'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Instrukcije za promenu broja mobilnog telefona biće poslate na korisnikov e-mail.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. While grammatically correct, it could be more fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Інструкції щодо зміни номера мобільного телефону будуть надіслані на електронну пошту користувача.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Hướng dẫn thay đổi số điện thoại di động của người dùng sẽ được gửi đến địa chỉ email của người' is slightly awkward and not the most natural way to express the original meaning. While technically correct, it lacks fluency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hướng dẫn thay đổi số điện thoại của người dùng sẽ được gửi đến địa chỉ email của họ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'người' is repeated. While grammatically correct, it can be stylistically improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hướng dẫn thay đổi số điện thoại của người dùng sẽ được gửi đến địa chỉ email của họ.
